html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13032024-12-09ESDC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Pension Plan Disability Pension, Post-retirement Disability Benefit, Disabled Contributor's Child's Benefit and Retirement Pension Overpayments Remission Order
PrecisCANADA PENSION PLAN DISABILITY PENSION, POST-RETIREMENT DISABILITY BENEFIT, DISABLED CONTRIBUTOR'S CHILD'S BENEFIT AND RETIREMENT PENSION OVERPAYMENTS REMISSIONS ORDER in order to allow for the remission of overpayments incurred by beneficiaries of the Canada Pension Plan (CPP) Disability Pension and the Post-retirement Disability Benefit (PRDB) and their dependent children for whom there was a delay in processing the reassessment of continuing eligibility.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: CANADA PENSION PLAN DISABILITY PENSION, POST-RETIREMENT DISABILITY BENEFIT, DISABLED CONTRIBUTOR'S CHILD'S BENEFIT AND RETIREMENT PENSION OVERPAYMENTS REMISSIONS ORDER in order to allow for the remission of overpayments incurred by beneficiaries of the Canada Pension Plan (CPP) Disability Pension and the Post-retirement Disability Benefit (PRDB) and their dependent children for whom there was a delay in processing the reassessment of continuing eligibility.
